name: The Autumn Fall
description:
It's autumn time and the leaves are falling from the trees. It's time to do the yearly chore of gathering up all those leaves and getting them stored away.

You play as Ty, who's chore it is to clean the back yard. He has decided to make a game out of it and see how many he can catch before they hit the ground.

Gather the leaves and get them stored in the wood shed before time runs out!

Catch leaves consecutively to get a streak going and earn some sweet bonuses!

Try to beat your high score and see how many levels you can get to.

Watch out for those pesky squirrels throwing acorns at you!
